message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a serious offer to you today. I'll sell it to you for $12000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $8000 is a good price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a counteroffer. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and features.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $9000. I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll meet you at $9200, which is a compromise between our previous offers. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and features.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9000, but I need to be careful with my finances. Can you meet me at $9000?

I understand that you're trying to be careful with your finances, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $9000. I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll meet you at $9100, which is a small increase from my previous offer. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and features.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $9100. I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a better deal. Can you meet me at $8800?

I understand that you're willing to walk away, Bob. However, I'm not willing to drop the price that low. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $9050, which is a compromise between our previous offers. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and features.
I'm really trying to be reasonable here, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $8800. This is my final offer. I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.
